name: Design Divas
tag_list: search-engine-marketing, web-design, internet-marketing, free-website, seo, ecommerce
overview:
Design Divas is an internet marketing and web design company. Marketing services include localized business marketing, search engine optimization and search engine marketing, keyword marketing, PayPerClick advertising, social media networking such as facebook, linkedin, google groups, etc, Google Maps, and many more.

Design Divas also offers custom web design and redesign. Each business has an image they want to portray and Design Divas works diligently to do that through web design. If a web site is already in place, Divas can redesign the site to match your business and business needs.

Design Divas also offers Ecommerce web design with paypal integration up to a full merchant account depending on each business.

Reputation management is a service Design Divas provides to most customers. Every business has a disgruntled customer, employee, or competitor that has posted negative feedback. Reputation management is put in place and those negative reviews get removed or pushed down so they do not affect the business name.

Other services include directory submission, link building, link baiting, article submission and press release. Each one of these services are used for ranking in search engines like Google and Yahoo and bringing in traffic to your site from other web sites.

Design Divas offers all of its services at the lowest prices available. Call today 713 540 1536.
